page.title: 08 Shopping in Boars Hill
page.content: There is a small supermarket on Boars Hill which also serves as a sub Post Office and a sports shop in the Hinksey area. People in the area tend to do most of their shopping in Abingdon or Oxford. The most popular food shops are Tesco and Gateway supermarkets in Abingdon and Sainsbury supermarkets in Oxford and Cowley. Tesco run a free bus service on two days each week which weaves its way through the area to the supermarket and returns by the same route 2 hours later. This service is well used, particularly by older people. Mobile shops coming in to the area include a fish van, a mobile grocery shop and milk roundsmen and bread delivery vans.
